careers.title: Join Us
careers.description: Bringing intelligent, versatile robots into reality.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Astribot was founded in Shenzhen in December 2022. As a leading AI robotics company, our vision is to empower billions of people with Al robotic partners, and our mission is to promote co-existence, co-creation and co-prosperity between humans and robots.
about.nextcontent: The company has pioneered a software-hardware integrated system architecture for AI (Design for AI, DFAI), deeply coupling 'AI capabilities' with 'optimal manipulation'. This innovation has led to key breakthroughs in embodied intelligence and data acquisition, enabling robots to learn, think, and work like humans while fostering smooth and intelligent interactions with people.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you want to become an industry partner, please fill in the information first.

product.title: Products
product.description: This is the product introduction page content

video.title: Astribot S1
video.subtitle: Your AI Robotic Partner, Together Forward

performance.title: Our new AI humanoid robot brings more service possibilities
performance.description: Our company has pioneered a software - hardware integrated system architecture for AI (Design for AI, DFAI), deeply coupling 'AI capabilitities' with 'optimal operation'. This innovation enables S1 to learn, think, and work more like humans.

specs.title: Human-like abilities, Greater creativity
specs.description: Astribot S1 mirrors an adult male's operational parameters, delivering exceptional performance, stability, and safety - empowering researchers and explorers to bring imagination to life.
specs.note: Note: S1 is designed for researchers, developers and specific scenario users, with potential for higher performance indicators.

comparison.note: *This version is designed for scientific research, with select parameters unlockable for enhanced performance.

toolchain.title: Powerful Toolchain for Breakthrough Research
toolchain.description: Optimize onboard toolchains to create an open, efficient ecosystem - accelerating the development and validation of cutting-edge algorithms and models.

features.title: Comprehensive API
features.description: Complete API interface supporting multiple programming languages to meet various development needs

features.title: Expert Development Guidelines
features.description: Detailed development documentation and sample code to help developers get started quickly

features.title: User-friendly Visual Development Interface
features.description: Graphical operation interface to lower the barrier to entry, enabling rapid development without programming background

features.title: Support for Major Simulation Platforms
features.description: Compatible with mainstream simulation platforms like MuJoco for easy migration of existing algorithms and models

features.title: Complete AI Deployment Guidance
features.description: End-to-end technical support and guidance from data collection to model training and deployment testing

features.title: Fast and Reliable Technical Support
features.description: Professional technical support team that quickly responds to various developer questions and needs

teleoperation.title: VR Teleoperation: Let Astribot Become Your AI Training Partner

sections.title: Ultra-Efficient Data Collection, 5x Faster Training
points: Real-time VR teleoperation with low latency motion synchronization
Each pick and place cycle takes only 2 seconds
High-quality data throughout, with over 99% effective data

sections.title: Zero-code Astribot UI, Master in Minutes
points: Zero-code operation with a single click
